dcterms:description: The Carl dataset contains 41 different subjects with NIR, LWIR, and visible paired images. It includes a total of 4920 images, half of which are visible images and the other half are LWIR thermal images.
dcterms:title: Carl Dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Chen
P. J. Flynn
K. Bowyer
dcterms:description: The UND-X1 Collection dataset contains 82 different subjects with LWIR and visible paired images, featuring different expressions and images collected in various sessions.
dcterms:title: UND-X1 Collection

dcterms:creator: K. Mallat
J. Dugelay
dcterms:description: The EURECOM dataset contains seven different facial variations, five different illumination conditions, five different types of occlusions, and four different head poses belonging to 50 subjects, totaling 2100 images.
dcterms:title: EURECOM Dataset
